title: Naa Vetta Pora Aadu Lyrics Kadhal 2 Kalyanam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Yuvan Shankar Raja, Roshini
Lyrics: Snehan
Songs: Naa Vetta Pora Aadu
Movie: Kadhal 2 Kalyanam

Naa Vetta Pora Aadu, Enna beera oothi kulipaatuda
Ennai vettai aada vaara, andha vetta kaari ivathanada
Kalyanam thaan, cultur-unu sonnavana konda maamu
vettiputtu ullapora, jailu kooda vendam maamu

Final count down,inga arambathan aayidichu
Maximuma oothiko nee
Freedom down down, inga vera ponna paakkakuda
Licence illa unnaku

overah seenathaan podatha enkitta
Nanumthan ivankitta mattikiten
kalyanam pannamal vazhdhale thappendru solkindra
kootathil sikikitten

Naa Vetta Pora Aadu, Enna beera oothi kulipaatuda
Ennai vettai aada vaara, andha vetta kaari ivathanada

Bacheloru vazhkai ellam, two-way illa poradhupol
Engae venumnaalum u-turn pannalam
marriage illa maatikita one-wayilla poradhu pol
thirumbida vazhiye illa enna pannalam

Future maaruthuda,oveviyo.. BP erudhuda oveviyo..
Kadasi aatam idhu, kalakal aatam idhu
vazhivil kalyanam panathaan othigai kidayaadhadi

Naa Vetta Pora Aadu, Enna beera oothi kulipaatuda
Ennai vettai aada vaara, andha vetta kaari ivathanada

kalamellam un mohatha kalayila paakanume
nenachale nenjukulla vetpam yeruthe
Unna sutthi varanumnu,thittapottu kavuthu pota
Unna pathi theiryum poda pollatha KD

Villan neethana da, oho ho h
Veena merattadhada, oho ho h
nastam ennakum thaanada, over acting enda
vazhivil kalyanam panathaan othigai kidayaadhada
